: : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :

Kup:  Well now your getting ahead of my time. As far as I know the Maximals won the first Beast Wars, and just returned to Cybertron.

Rodimus Prime: You dont know about the Maximal Council of Elders? Your a Maximal, you should know about our government.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: airly2000 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:30 AM
  Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron


  Nightlight::

  "The MAximal Council of Elders??"she said as if that didn't meant any 
  for her, after that she said "And Primal?? What happen with the war 
  that started here? "


  --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  > : : Rodimus Prime / Kup : :
  > 
  > Kup: I'm not really sure...
  > 
  > Rodimus Prime: I do. He simply retired when we switched from having 
  one supreme Commander to the Maximal Council of Elders.
  >   ----- Original Message ----- 
  >   From: airly2000 
  >   To: nbwrpg@y... 
  >   Sent: Wednesday, August 14, 2002 1:11 AM
  >   Subject: Re: Rodimus, Quilldart, Galvatron
  > 
  > 
  >   Nightlight::
  > 
  >   "What happen with Optimus??"asked Nightlight"is he still alive?"
  > 
  > 
  > 
  >   --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
  >   > : : Kup / Rodimus Prime : :
  >   > 
  >   > Kup: Well we are getting a little off track...
  >   > 
  >   > Rodimus Prime: Go ahead and tell her the stories Kup. Our 
  history 
  >   doesn't bother me, just Galvatron.
  >   > 
  >   > Kup: Very well. You see Nightlight Optimus had once been 
  brought 
  >   back but with little control of himself. He was a zombie. It was 
  all 
  >   a Quintesson trap. He was to lead us Autobots to are destruction. 
  >   Prime fought it though and saved us, however he was on a ship 
  that 
  >   was destroyed. We thought he was lost forever. About six months 
  later 
  >   we learned that a Science ship from Earth had been near by. They 
  were 
  >   testing a new alloy, by seeing if their ship could withstand a 
  sun 
  >   going nova near by. It did. They also pulled Optimus out before 
  his 
  >   ship was destroyed. They had also taken aboard spores from the 
  sun. 
  >   Mere contact with these spores turned living things into hateful 
  >   maniacs. The scientists who found the spores hated Transformers 
  so 
  >   they lead us to find Optimus. Then they infected many Autobots. 
  It 
  >   soon spread to the Decepticons, the human race, and then into the 
  >   universe. Rodimus was even infected. We managed to have a 
  Quintesson 
  >   rebuild Optimus once again. By coating himself in the alloy from 
  the 
  >   science ship he was able to take the Matrix of Leadership from 
  >   Rodimus. Optimus used the last power of the Matrix and destroyed 
  the 
  >   Plague with the wisdom of the ages. Optimus continued to lead us 
  from 
  >   then on untill the Great Wrs ended. Thats when everything was 
  scaled 
  >   down and Maximals and Predacons were born.
  >   > 
  >   > OOC: The events I am talking about can be seen in the following 
  >   third season episodes of "The Transformers": "Dark 
  >   Awakaning," "Return of Optimus Prime Part. 1," and "Return of 
  Optimus 
  >   Prime Part. 2"

  You 
  >   see 
  >   >   after 
  >   >   >   killing Optimus Prime in combat in 2005, Megatron was 
  rebuilt 
  >   >   into 
  >   >   >   Galvatron by Unicron. Galvatron continued to lead the 
  >   Decepticons 
  >   >   >   from then on. Rodimus here lead the Autobots after he 
  >   destroyed 
  >   >   >   Unicron and saved Cybertron. Being that they were the 
  >   opposing 
  >   >   >   Commanders that kinda made them into arch rivals. This 
  still 
  >   >   exists 
  >   >   >   to this day.
  >   >   >   >

  would

  The 
  >   >   boulder 
  >   >   >   >   crumbles around the Autobot's fist.
  >   >   >   >   >

  >   comes 
  >   >   down 
  >   >   >   to 
  >   >   >   >   just him and I, I'll take him down for good. I didn't 
  get 
  >   it 
  >   >   done 
  >   >   >   >   before, but I'll make sure of it now...
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   > Kup: Calm down, lad. I know how you feel. i've been 
  >   with 
  >   >   you a 
  >   >   >   long 
  >   >   >   >   time Rody, I've seen all the crap he's done. You'll 
  get 
  >   him, 
  >   >   and 
  >   >   >   I'll 
  >   >   >   >   be the first to congradulate you.
  >   >   >   >   > 
  >   >   >   >   > Rodimus Prime: Thanks old friend.

  >   >   >   >   >   From: aerosmith60@c...

  base. "Good 
  >   no 
  >   >   doubt 
  >   >   >   the 
  >   >   >   >   other two are not far behind." He sent a comm to 
  Rodimus. 
  >   A 
  >   >   >   >   holographic image of himself would display. "I am so 
  glad 
  >   >   Rodimus 
  >   >   >   we 
  >   >   >   >   could come to terms. As for our one on one battle. 
  Dont 
  >   you 
  >   >   >   worry. 
  >   >   >   >   That will happen in due time. Until then best of luck 
  my 
  >   old 
  >   >   >   friend. 
  >   >   >   >   I havent had this much fun since our little unicron 
  >   >   >   >   adventure...wouldnt you agree?" He ended the comm and 
  >   turned 
  >   >   back 
  >   >   >   to 
  >   >   >   >   the map. He had his three blips on the screen.
